mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_resume_career (resume_no, resume_career_company_name, resume_career_join_dt, resume_career_out_dt, resume_career_department_name, resume_career_position, resume_career_duties, resume_career_job) VALUES (#{resumeNo}, #{resumeCareerCompanyName}, #{resumeCareerJoinDt}, #{resumeCareerOutDt}, #{resumeCareerDepartmentName}, #{resumeCareerPosition}, #{resumeCareerDuties}, #{resumeCareerJob})
